attributes.action: ensure that the off road vehicles (motorcycle) bill does not become law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this hastily conceived and ill considered proposal will make illegal inocent enjoyment of thousands of motorcyclist of all descriptions from grass track and road racers to owners of vintage and veteran machines

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
